std::string BabelShark::AsciiElement::AsciiElement::Printable ( char  inChar  )  [private]

Checks to see if a character is printable. if it is, it returns a string with that character stored in it. if not, it returns a string with a single space in it.

char * BabelShark::AsciiElement::Display (  )  [virtual]

Display function for Ascii; will just print the bytes as a character
